name: .TDA3MT File Extension
summary: Learn about .TDA3MT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A TDA3MT file is a template for creating a new DVD-like DivX movie with DivX Author. It includes a background image, pre-formatted text, full-motion menus, and other animations. TDA3MT files are typically combined with other media and used to create .DIVX DVD video files.

content: DivX Author is a video creation program that allows users to create DivX-encoded movies, better known as DIVX files. As part of creating movies, users can create, load, and apply DVD background and menu templates saved in TDA3MT files. This allows users to create DivX DVDs.

You can play DivX DVDs that include TDA3MT-based menus on any DivX Certified device and in DivX Player. However, only DivX Ultra Certified devices and DivX Player 9 and lower will process the file's TDA3MT menu. Other devices and players will ignore the menu and instead simply begin playing the disc's video content.

instructions: You can open and edit a TDA3MT file in DivX Author (Windows). The program is discontinued but still available for download from some websites.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
